questions.question_text: How is the cross-functional team involved in the product development process?

answer_options.A: The cross-functional team does not exist in the product development process.
answer_options.B: The cross-functional team exists but is not regularly involved in the process.
answer_options.C: The cross-functional team is involved in most stages of product development.

questions.question_text: How are all stakeholders engaged in the project team, even when they are globally dispersed?

answer_options.D: Stakeholders are engaged even when globally dispersed, but collaboration still requires improvement.

questions.question_text: How clearly defined are the roles and responsibilities of each individual?

questions.question_text: What is the technical background and engagement level of the product managers in the projects?
